meta.description: Determine the optimal number of units of sulfate and ginger to add to a shampoo to minimize the total effective time.

sets.name: INGREDIENTS
sets.description: Types of ingredients to be added to the shampoo.

params.name: time_per_unit
params.description: Time in minutes for each unit of ingredient to be effective.

vars.name: units
vars.description: Number of units of each ingredient to add to the shampoo.

objective.name: min_total_effective_time
objective.description: Minimize the total effective time of the shampoo mixture.

constraints.name: min_sulfate_requirement
constraints.description: The shampoo must contain at least 100 units of sulfate.

constraints.name: total_ingredient_requirement
constraints.description: The total units of both ingredients must be 400.

constraints.name: sulfate_ginger_ratio_limit
constraints.description: There can be at most twice the amount of sulfate as ginger in the shampoo.
